column2: Cute small spot for under 5 yr olds
column3: This small corner of Universal has a nice little Dumbo style ride, playground and cute minions too. The splash pad is a good size for hot days if you are prepared!
So cute with so many fun things to do, Super Silly Fun Land is perfect for younger kiddos. Highly recommend!

Super Silly Fun Land comes alive. It can be a place to cool off on hot days, or just enjoy the movie tie-in. Part of it is a waterpark oriented for kids, all done off the Minion movies. Have fun! Become a minion! (Offer void in Canada)
They have done a great job of giving the young and young at heart a fun little corner of the park. The kids were loving it and the parents got a wee break!Just enjoy where you are and the experience.
